subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Jody

------=_NextPart_000_00B7_01C6A130.798A5990
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Hi Vicki,
I haven't had enough success with DRV to explain my method.  When=
 I did my last session the radio was on 610 AM I could hear bursts of stati=
c ever so often that ended up being them speaking.  It was really cool.  I =
was standing up and it felt like the wind was being sucked out through my h=
eart chakra and solar plexus.  Not really an unpleasant feeling, but next t=
ime I'm gonna sit down to see if that helps.

Good Luck :)

  ----- Origina=
l Message ----- 
  From: Vicki Talbott 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Se=
nt: Thursday, July 06, 2006 4:56 PM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Jody


  Hi Jo=
dy (and Frank)--I'm interested in how you are conducting you DRV sessions. =
 Could you give me a breif explanation?  I'd really like to start trying th=
is form of communication.  Jody, in your first one, it sounds like the enti=
ty is trying to say more than hello, but I can't quite make it out.  There'=
s a lot of noise around here today, lawnmowers, etc.  Thanks, Vicki

  Jody=
 Cupp <bigrig309@...> wrote: 

    Frank,
    I''ve been dabbling with =
DRV the last couple days. I did have a small success a couple days ago. Whe=
n did you get your 170 message? 

    Attached is a very brief communicatio=
n.  Spirit says "hello" then I say "heyyyy"  on play back it sounds like "h=
ello you"  a couple other times I heard them try to speak but I couldn't un=
derstand them.  I'm also attaching one that I didn't understand right away.=
 Joe is my oldest son.  I got these on 610 AM but I can't get anything on m=
y stereo the last couple days but clicks and some broadcasts.  I did revers=
e some broadcasts and got some messages out of them, regarding changing my =
frequency, but I haven't noticed anything different.



      ----- Origina=
l Message ----- 
      From: Sumption Frank 
      To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.=
com 
      Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2006 4:04 PM
      Subject: RE: [EVP-IT=
C] Jody


       Speaking of radio, I got a voice that I didn't copy to the=
 computer, that said to listen on 107 mhz, presumably FM. They also said to=
 "call 70", which to me is the 70 cm ham band, which I do have a rig for. 
=
       My wife no believe this either, I can see her actually turn off as I=
 start talking ghosts, or the electronics involved. You'd think with her cl=
ose call she would be more interested, but I think the necromonger brainwas=
hing from the doctors is already too deep. Necromonger for lack of a better=
 term, "our culture of fear of death society", so bozo doctors can get rich=
. 
       I have the RVG side of a second micro system working. I don't thi=
nk I'll try using the surface mount parts on the next systems. It's a real =
pa in to repair the surface mount boards if a part goes bad, like I had las=
t night.  I can always tell if there's a problem, cuz I'm real reluctant to=
 get started on a problem board, not knowing that there actually is a probl=
em. I drug my feet for almost a month ion this system, or course part of th=
at was due to being tied up with the younger grand son.  

----------------=
----------------------------------------------------------

      From: EV =
P-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of Jody Cu=
pp
      Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2006 11:01 AM
      To: EVP-ITC@yahoogrou=
ps.com
      Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Jody
      I agree but if it is them th=
at are not willing to talk that way then there is not much I can do.  I've =
had luck using this method.  But I think the warning has to do with skeptic=
s.  Interestingly,  I posted this evp on a message board when I received it=
 back in December and got a lot of slack from a chic on the board.  She was=
 the biggest Witch (a moderator too), because she did not get any results h=
erself.  I honestly don't care, who believes me or not. So this could have =
been a warning in regards to her.   BTW, your hubby will be more accepting =
in time, just give him time.  Bri is a lot more open, especially after goin=
g to that cemetery in Ohio. Although, lol he said he would never go with me=
 again.  He has a different belief system then I do, and I respect that.
  =
    Jody
      Originally received December 10, 2005-notes below
      My l=
ittle guy was using the computer and I thought I'd meditate.. lol but can't=
 find the cd I like so I turned on the radio in my room to use the cd playe=
r.. it no longer works not sure why cause we rarely use it.  So I'm sure th=
is is boring you.&nb sp; But I got an idea to test with the radio again.  I=
'm bored housework is done and my little guy is using the pc so he doesn't =
need me.  
      They are telling me that this method is not going to be ac=
cepted by the others.  Whomever the others may be.  I had the radio between=
 a sports broadcast and another channel.   I amplified this 50%
